Content: Mahathma Gandhi’s birth anniversary marked 150 th birth anniversary of Mahathma Gandhi was held at Temple Trees under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe. The newly constructed Gandhi statue at the Temple Trees in line with the Mahathma Gandhi’s birth anniversary was unveiled with the presence of Prime Minister Wickremesinghe and Indian High Commissioner in Sri Lanka Taranjit Singh Sandhu. After the opening of the statue, a floral tributes was accorded to the statue. Minister A.H.M.Haleem presented a new stamp that has been launched to mark the Gandhi’s anniversary to the Prime Minister. Ministers Sagala Ratnayake and Navin Dissanayake were also present at the event. Meanwhile, an art exhibition was organized at the Lakshman Kadirgamar Center to mark the birth anniversary of Mahathma Gandhi. 20 school children who have submitted their drawings to the art exhibition were awarded for their excellence.
